body_html:
Try using the libs from torch_nightly. PyTorch is still moving too fast to mix versions, so the error your getting (your C++ lib is too old) is legitimate.
You can just use the Torch_DIR/Caffe2_DIR from the "shared/Torch" subdirectory of your PyTorch installation.
body_text:
Try using the libs from torch_nightly. PyTorch is still moving too fast to mix versions, so the error your getting (your C++ lib is too old) is legitimate.
You can just use the Torch_DIR/Caffe2_DIR from the "shared/Torch" subdirectory of your PyTorch installation.
body:
Try using the libs from torch_nightly. PyTorch is still moving too fast to mix versions, so the error your getting (your C++ lib is too old) is legitimate.
You can just use the Torch_DIR/Caffe2_DIR from the "shared/Torch" subdirectory of your PyTorch installation.
